overview:
Ken joined Certain in 2006 and leads Certain Registration Sales, Marketing and Implementation Services organizations. Ken brings a proven track record of developing empowered teams and providing excellence in customer experience.

Prior to joining Certain, Mr. Voss was a co-founder of Spear Technologies, where he held key executive positions including Vice President of Sales, Marketing and Business Development. Mr. Voss was instrumental in positioning Spear Technologies as a leader in its market, providing a successful exit strategy for its investors, Spear Technology is now owned by Infor Global Solutions, a $2 billion enterprise application company. Mr. Voss also brings a strong record of success as Vice President of Sales and Marketing for TENERA, Inc.; Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Software Professionals, where he was a key member of the executive team who took that company public in a successful IPO; and Vice President and General Manager at SHL Systemhouse, where he was part of the management team that grew revenues from $15 million to $1 billion.
